name: A Hike of Teeth
description:
Take the role of a villager recently turned into a werewolf for a day, in an effort to evade hunters, and leave the land they've trapped you in.

Featuring 20K+ of words, 2 major routes, 4-7 endings.

This is  my first officially released work, made as a learning experience and an effort to see something through in a short amount of time/during a busy period of my life.

Tested and revised a few times, there should be nothing game breaking or glitching within it, if something does come up, feel free to comment and let me know of any issues you may have. This features more than few spelling/grammatical issues that I'm aware of, and may be updated/fixed at a later date, but shouldn't impede any readings.

If you enjoyed it feel free to comment, if you thought you'd want to pay money after the experience, instead donate it to a good cause, treat yourself, or just do a kind act in general for me instead.

Or just spend your money as you will, it is yours after all.
